Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
			var sStr = prompt("梦之都的网址是什么？","请在这里输入");
			if(sStr!=null&&sStr!="")
			{
				alert("你输入的是："+sStr);
			}
			else
			{
				alert("你什么也没有输入");
			}
      function ChangeDisabled(value){
　if(value=='1'){
 var strA = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MAxYcyGdJxwN8yJlUj4u9kypTO6gyzqpXlagb4xUBhg/gviz/tq?tqx=out:html&tq=select%20D,%20H%20where%20H%20contains%20%";
var strB = TetstText.value;
  var strC = "%27";
　open(strA.concat(strB).concat(strC));
　}else{
　}
}
		</script>
     <input type="text" id="TetstText">
<input type="button" value='查詢購買的客戶' onclick="ChangeDisabled(1)">
